name: Language
title: Gcloud
Translate
Language
description:
Language

Represents a supported languages query result. Returned by Gcloud::Translate::Api#languages.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
translate = gcloud.translate

languages = translate.languages "en"

languages.size #=> 104
languages[0].code #=> "af"
languages[0].name #=> "Afrikaans"

methods.name: code
title: Gcloud
Translate
Language#code
methods.description: The language code. This is an ISO 639-1 language code.

methods.name: name
title: Gcloud
Translate
Language#name
methods.description: The localized name of the language, if available.
